mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.order_date orderDate, t.input_date inputDate, t.input_user_state inputUserState, t.order_user_state orderUserState FROM t_gq_fss_check_date t
mapper.select: SELECT t.id id, t.order_date orderDate, MIN(t.input_date) inputDate, t.input_user_state inputUserState, t.order_user_state orderUserState FROM t_gq_fss_check_date t WHERE t.input_user_state = '98010002' AND t.input_date >= '20150601'AND t.input_date IS NOT NULL
